name: Management Done Right
description:
Management Done Right is a game prototype based around the fact that the customers in your cafe slowly begin to go crazy as you try to manage the cafe.

Click the UI above customers' heads to take your customers’ orders (Every order is currently one burger; order sidebar is not implemented yet). Pick up items by clicking on them and place down items by clicking on a counter while holding an item. To make an order, place the meat on the stove and when the meat is cooked well, put it on a plate that has already has a bottom bun on it. Make sure to add the top bun! Place the burger, plate and all, on the takeout counter and a customer should come and pick it up. Every time a customer leaves the restaurant, they get a bit crazier. Soon you will not only have to cook food, but also keep your customers in line as they go crazy.

Press the Esc key to quit the game.

Warning: This is an early prototype. This game is nowhere near completion. This prototype is based around the crazy customers, as that part is the most experimental mechanic. We want your feedback!
